pages.title: Slow
pages.text: Slow is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#87185d)$(l)essence of sloth and torpor$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to slow down the movement speed of their targets with each successful hit.

Slow is a powerful runic power that can disrupt the flow of battle and give the wielder a strategic advantage. $(br2)It's ideal for characters that rely on hit-and-run tactics, as it allows them to slow down the chase and make a quick getaway.
